productsList.c_customParsedProductDescription:
{"html":"

DESCRIPTION


The Top Fin Excite Aquarium provides a safe, comfortable and aesthetically pleasing home for your fish. This aquarium makes feeding easy with a convenient feeding door on the hood, and even includes a bright white LED fixture to light up your underwater world. Only at PetSmart.

Features: Bright white LED; Hood with convenient feeding door

Includes:

  • 1 Tank
  • Top Fin \"Element\" filter cartridge
  • Top Fin "Element" filter

    Intended For: Fish

    Material: Plastic

    Color: Black

    Size: 1 US GAL (3.7 L); 10.4 in L x 6.9 in W x 8.4 in H (26.4 x 17.5 x 21.3 cm)

    Instructions:
    Place aquarium on a stable, sturdy surface away from heat, cold and direct sunlight. Use an aquarium heater, if needed, to maintain stable water temperatures.

    Choose your favorite color gravel, or mix or match.

    Condition water during set up and each water change. Water testing, water conditioner, and bacteria starter are keys to success. Let water sit for 4 hours before introducing fish.

    Compliment your personal style and provide shelter for your fish.

    Feed your fish with the appropriate type and amount of food.

    Caution: Choose the appropriate quantity of compatible fish. Thoroughly rinse gravel and decor. Do not use soap or detergent as they may harm fish.","tabs":{"Description":["DESCRIPTION


    The Top Fin Excite Aquarium provides a safe, comfortable and aesthetically pleasing home for your fish. This aquarium makes feeding easy with a convenient feeding door on the hood, and even includes a bright white LED fixture to light up your underwater world. Only at PetSmart.

    Features: Bright white LED; Hood with convenient feeding door

    Includes:

  • 1 Tank
  • Top Fin \"Element\" filter cartridge
  • Top Fin "Element" filter

    Intended For: Fish

    Material: Plastic

    Color: Black

    "],"Directions":["Instructions:
    Place aquarium on a stable, sturdy surface away from heat, cold and direct sunlight. Use an aquarium heater, if needed, to maintain stable water temperatures.

    Choose your favorite color gravel, or mix or match.

    Condition water during set up and each water change. Water testing, water conditioner, and bacteria starter are keys to success. Let water sit for 4 hours before introducing fish.

    Compliment your personal style and provide shelter for your fish.

    Feed your fish with the appropriate type and amount of food.

    Caution: Choose the appropriate quantity of compatible fish. Thoroughly rinse gravel and decor. Do not use soap or detergent as they may harm fish."],"Size":["Size: 1 US GAL (3.7 L); 10.4 in L x 6.9 in W x 8.4 in H (26.4 x 17.5 x 21.3 cm)

    "]}}
productsList.long_description:
DESCRIPTION

The Top Fin Excite Aquarium provides a safe, comfortable and aesthetically pleasing home for your fish. This aquarium makes feeding easy with a convenient feeding door on the hood, and even includes a bright white LED fixture to light up your underwater world. Only at PetSmart.

Features: Bright white LED; Hood with convenient feeding door
Includes:

  • 1 Tank
  • Top Fin "Element" filter cartridge
  • Top Fin "Element" filter

    Intended For: Fish
    Material: Plastic
    Color: Black
    Size: 1 US GAL (3.7 L); 10.4 in L x 6.9 in W x 8.4 in H (26.4 x 17.5 x 21.3 cm)

    Instructions:
    Place aquarium on a stable, sturdy surface away from heat, cold and direct sunlight. Use an aquarium heater, if needed, to maintain stable water temperatures.

    Choose your favorite color gravel, or mix or match.

    Condition water during set up and each water change. Water testing, water conditioner, and bacteria starter are keys to success. Let water sit for 4 hours before introducing fish.

    Compliment your personal style and provide shelter for your fish.

    Feed your fish with the appropriate type and amount of food.

    Caution: Choose the appropriate quantity of compatible fish. Thoroughly rinse gravel and decor. Do not use soap or detergent as they may harm fish.

DESCRIPTION

The Top Fin Excite Aquarium provides a safe, comfortable and aesthetically pleasing home for your fish. This aquarium makes feeding easy with a convenient feeding door on the hood, and even includes a bright white LED fixture to light up your underwater world. Only at PetSmart.

Features: Bright white LED; Hood with convenient feeding door
Includes:

  • 1 Tank
  • Top Fin "Element" filter cartridge
  • Top Fin "Element" filter

    Intended For: Fish
    Material: Plastic
    Color: Black
    Size: 1 US GAL (3.7 L); 10.4 in L x 6.9 in W x 8.4 in H (26.4 x 17.5 x 21.3 cm)

    Instructions:
    Place aquarium on a stable, sturdy surface away from heat, cold and direct sunlight. Use an aquarium heater, if needed, to maintain stable water temperatures.

    Choose your favorite color gravel, or mix or match.

    Condition water during set up and each water change. Water testing, water conditioner, and bacteria starter are keys to success. Let water sit for 4 hours before introducing fish.

    Compliment your personal style and provide shelter for your fish.

    Feed your fish with the appropriate type and amount of food.

    Caution: Choose the appropriate quantity of compatible fish. Thoroughly rinse gravel and decor. Do not use soap or detergent as they may harm fish.

productsList.long_description:
DESCRIPTION

The Top Fin Excite Aquarium provides a safe, comfortable and aesthetically pleasing home for your fish. This aquarium makes feeding easy with a convenient feeding door on the hood, and even includes a bright white LED fixture to light up your underwater world. Only at PetSmart.

Features: Bright white LED; Hood with convenient feeding door
Includes:

  • 1 Tank
  • Top Fin "Element" filter cartridge
  • Top Fin "Element" filter

    Intended For: Fish
    Material: Plastic
    Color: Black
    Size: 1 US GAL (3.7 L); 10.4 in L x 6.9 in W x 8.4 in H (26.4 x 17.5 x 21.3 cm)

    Instructions:
    Place aquarium on a stable, sturdy surface away from heat, cold and direct sunlight. Use an aquarium heater, if needed, to maintain stable water temperatures.

    Choose your favorite color gravel, or mix or match.

    Condition water during set up and each water change. Water testing, water conditioner, and bacteria starter are keys to success. Let water sit for 4 hours before introducing fish.

    Compliment your personal style and provide shelter for your fish.

    Feed your fish with the appropriate type and amount of food.

    Caution: Choose the appropriate quantity of compatible fish. Thoroughly rinse gravel and decor. Do not use soap or detergent as they may harm fish.

DESCRIPTION

The Top Fin Excite Aquarium provides a safe, comfortable and aesthetically pleasing home for your fish. This aquarium makes feeding easy with a convenient feeding door on the hood, and even includes a bright white LED fixture to light up your underwater world. Only at PetSmart.

Features: Bright white LED; Hood with convenient feeding door
Includes:

  • 1 Tank
  • Top Fin "Element" filter cartridge
  • Top Fin "Element" filter

    Intended For: Fish
    Material: Plastic
    Color: Black
    Size: 1 US GAL (3.7 L); 10.4 in L x 6.9 in W x 8.4 in H (26.4 x 17.5 x 21.3 cm)

    Instructions:
    Place aquarium on a stable, sturdy surface away from heat, cold and direct sunlight. Use an aquarium heater, if needed, to maintain stable water temperatures.

    Choose your favorite color gravel, or mix or match.

    Condition water during set up and each water change. Water testing, water conditioner, and bacteria starter are keys to success. Let water sit for 4 hours before introducing fish.

    Compliment your personal style and provide shelter for your fish.

    Feed your fish with the appropriate type and amount of food.

    Caution: Choose the appropriate quantity of compatible fish. Thoroughly rinse gravel and decor. Do not use soap or detergent as they may harm fish.

productsList.long_description:
DESCRIPTION

The Top Fin Excite Aquarium provides a safe, comfortable and aesthetically pleasing home for your fish. This aquarium makes feeding easy with a convenient feeding door on the hood, and even includes a bright white LED fixture to light up your underwater world. Only at PetSmart.

Features: Bright white LED; Hood with convenient feeding door
Includes:

  • 1 Tank
  • Top Fin "Element" filter cartridge
  • Top Fin "Element" filter

    Intended For: Fish
    Material: Plastic
    Color: Black
    Size: 1 US GAL (3.7 L); 10.4 in L x 6.9 in W x 8.4 in H (26.4 x 17.5 x 21.3 cm)

    Instructions:
    Place aquarium on a stable, sturdy surface away from heat, cold and direct sunlight. Use an aquarium heater, if needed, to maintain stable water temperatures.

    Choose your favorite color gravel, or mix or match.

    Condition water during set up and each water change. Water testing, water conditioner, and bacteria starter are keys to success. Let water sit for 4 hours before introducing fish.

    Compliment your personal style and provide shelter for your fish.

    Feed your fish with the appropriate type and amount of food.

    Caution: Choose the appropriate quantity of compatible fish. Thoroughly rinse gravel and decor. Do not use soap or detergent as they may harm fish.

productsList.long_description:
DESCRIPTION

The Top Fin Excite Aquarium provides a safe, comfortable and aesthetically pleasing home for your fish. This aquarium makes feeding easy with a convenient feeding door on the hood, and even includes a bright white LED fixture to light up your underwater world. Only at PetSmart.

Features: Bright white LED; Hood with convenient feeding door
Includes:

  • 1 Tank
  • Top Fin "Element" filter cartridge
  • Top Fin "Element" filter

    Intended For: Fish
    Material: Plastic
    Color: Black
    Size: 1 US GAL (3.7 L); 10.4 in L x 6.9 in W x 8.4 in H (26.4 x 17.5 x 21.3 cm)

    Instructions:
    Place aquarium on a stable, sturdy surface away from heat, cold and direct sunlight. Use an aquarium heater, if needed, to maintain stable water temperatures.

    Choose your favorite color gravel, or mix or match.

    Condition water during set up and each water change. Water testing, water conditioner, and bacteria starter are keys to success. Let water sit for 4 hours before introducing fish.

    Compliment your personal style and provide shelter for your fish.

    Feed your fish with the appropriate type and amount of food.

    Caution: Choose the appropriate quantity of compatible fish. Thoroughly rinse gravel and decor. Do not use soap or detergent as they may harm fish.

fishTipsSteps.title: Tips for Your Fish
fishTipsSteps.label: Provide nutrition for your fish that has similar ingredients to what they would eat in the wild.

fishTipsSteps.title: Tips for Your Fish
fishTipsSteps.label: Ensure the proper water temperature. Some species like goldfish prefer cooler water around 65-70 F while fish likeSouth American tetras prefer 80-83 F.

fishTipsSteps.title: Tips for Your Fish
fishTipsSteps.label: How you decorate your tank matters. For example, some cichlids like to have hiding places while most tetras prefer live or artificial plants.

tankTipsSteps.title: Choosing Your Tank
tankTipsSteps.label: Remember: water is heavy! Small desktop aquariums are great for countertops and sturdy tables, while bigger tanks require stands.

tankTipsSteps.title: Choosing Your Tank
tankTipsSteps.label: Place your tank in a roomtemperature, shaded space away from direct sunlight to reduce the chances of algae growth or temperature fluctuations.

tankTipsSteps.title: Choosing Your Tank
tankTipsSteps.label: As a general rule, you need 1 gallon of water for every 1 inch of fish. Also, keep in mind the potential growth of your fish.

accessoriesTipsSteps.title: Tips for Aquarium Accessories
accessoriesTipsSteps.label: Fish also enjoy lights out when they rest. Ideal light cycles are 12 hours on, 12 hours off in order to support fish health.

accessoriesTipsSteps.title: Tips for Aquarium Accessories
accessoriesTipsSteps.label: Replacing filter cartridges every 3-4 weeks helps your tank maintain optimal water quality.

accessoriesTipsSteps.title: Tips for Aquarium Accessories
accessoriesTipsSteps.label: Check your thermometer daily to ensure your tank is at the optimal temperature for your fish.

gravelDecorTipsSteps.title: Gravel & Dcor Tips
gravelDecorTipsSteps.label: Have fun customizing the dcor in your fishs home! We recommend having 2-3 items in each tank.

gravelDecorTipsSteps.title: Gravel & Dcor Tips
gravelDecorTipsSteps.label: Make sure the dcor is compatible. For example, bettas love to hide, so add a cave or plants. Cichlids prefer rock or slate ornaments.

gravelDecorTipsSteps.title: Gravel & Dcor Tips
gravelDecorTipsSteps.label: Rinse off gravel and dcor in water before placing in your tank.

careTipsSteps.title: Water Care Tips
careTipsSteps.label: Add water conditioner to tap water 24-48 hours before adding fish to stablize temperatures. Add bacteria starter only when adding fish, not before.

careTipsSteps.title: Water Care Tips
careTipsSteps.label: Tank scrubbers clean surfaces such as the glass, while gravel vacuums can be used for organic debris and waste at the bottom of your tank.
